summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation and to North Administrative Center Park; making an appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund for the final installment payment upon a note and mortgage executed in connection with the City's purchase of certain property in the southeast one-quarter of the southeast one-quarter of the southeast one-quarter of Section 30, township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., from Clarence B. Good and Maude H. Good.
